de.hu.gralog.structure.support
Class StructureDisplayChangeSupport<V,E>

java.lang.Object
  de.hu.gralog.structure.support.StructureDisplayChangeSupport<V,E>
Type Parameters:
V - the vertexType
E - the edgeType
All Implemented Interfaces:
DisplayChangeListenable<V,E>, DisplayChangeListener<V,E>
public class StructureDisplayChangeSupport<V,E>
extends Object
implements DisplayChangeListenable<V,E>, DisplayChangeListener<V,E>

This class is used by Structure as a helper to provide support for listenening and fireing DisplayChanges. It is of no use to Plugin-Developers.

Author:
Sebastian

Description copied from interface: DisplayChangeListener
This method is called when an DisplayChangeEvent has happened.

Specified by:
displayChange in interface DisplayChangeListener<V,E>
Parameters:
vertices - the vertices that have changed
edges - the edges that have changed
wholeGraph - if true the whole graph will be redisplayed
